name: bingle-api
description: The API for the Bingle app

scripts.lint: eslint . && echo '✓ ESLint check passed.' || (echo ✗ ESLint failed. && exit 1)
scripts.format: prettier --write . --loglevel error && echo '✓ Code formatted successfully.' || (echo ✗ Format failed. && exit 1)
scripts.validate-packages-file: jsonlint package.json > /dev/null && echo '✓ JSON check passed.' || (echo ✗ Jsonlint failed. && exit 1)
